attributes.action: Ensure the UK remains part of the European Economic Area once we leave the EU
attributes.additional_details:
For more information about why remaining part of the EEA is the best option for the UK once we leave the EU, visit:
https://www.facebook.com/ChooseEEA/
https://twitter.com/Choose_EEA
attributes.background: With the referendum over, the UK must now focus on what is best for the UK outside the EU. Remaining part of the European Economic Area and Single Market, allows us to continue trading freely with the EU and is the best way to maintain business and consumer confidence in our economy.
